Title: Catch-22
Plot: Pacey learns he has lost Dawson's money in the stock market. Back at school, Eddie surprises Joey with a trip to Europe for the summer, but a fiery conversation about how differently they live their lives leaves both of them questioning their future together.
GuestStars: Sarah Shahi, Irene Ziegler, Chris Snyder, Melissa Claire Egan, J. Matthew Stevens, David Shumbris
